Committee: Tourism, Parks, Arts And Sports Development

Milestones.Committee: Tourism, Parks, Arts And Sports Development

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT

Title: Requires the commissioner of the office of parks, recreation and historic preservation to promulgate rules requiring the use of automatic license plate reader systems at all entrances and exits to state parks
Summary: Requires the commissioner of the office of parks, recreation and historic preservation to promulgate rules and regulations requiring the use of automatic license plate reader systems at all entrances and exits to state parks and to assist municipalities in establishing policies and procedures for similar use of such license plate readers.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Amd ยง3.09, Pks & Rec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to requiring the commissioner of the office of parks, recreation and historic preservation to promulgate rules and regulations requiring the use of automatic license plate reader systems at all entrances and exits to state parks
